name: Winter Wastelands
description:
Winter Wastelands is a sci-fi fantasy action-adventure game about trying to escape the ice planet you crash-landed on.

Features:
  • Fight through enemies and bosses with a sword and special abilities gained along the way.
  • Explore the 7 areas.
  • Find new items and costumes to obtain special abilities.
  • Meet strange and vibrant characters.
  • Bright and colorful pixel art.
  • Programming, design, art, animation, and music all made by one person.

Photosensitive Warning: This game contains sequences of flashing bright colors.
